columns.Template_Type_Code: The unique identifier for template types.
columns.Template_Type_Description: The detailed description of each template type.

Ref_Template_Types.table_description: The table categorizes different types of document templates.

columns.Template_ID: The unique identifier for each template.
columns.Version_Number: The version number of the template.
columns.Template_Type_Code: The code representing the type of the template.
columns.Date_Effective_From: The start date when the template is effective.
columns.Date_Effective_To: The end date when the template is effective.
columns.Template_Details: The details and specifications of the template.

Templates.table_description: The table stores information and versions of various document templates.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.Template_ID: The identifier for the associated template.
columns.Document_Name: The name or title of the document.
columns.Document_Description: The brief description summarizing the document content.
columns.Other_Details: The additional details pertaining to the document.

Documents.table_description: The table stores information about various documents linked to templates.

columns.Paragraph_ID: The unique identifier for each paragraph.
columns.Document_ID: The identifier for the associated document.
columns.Paragraph_Text: The textual content of the paragraph.
columns.Other_Details: The additional details associated with the paragraph.

Paragraphs.table_description: The table stores paragraphs linked to specific documents.
